title: Riot can't help figure out left handed mouse
body:
I am struggling to figure out how I can play League with a left handed mouse formatted to right handed. There is no in-game way to change 'player move click' to MB2. Are there any other players using a left handed mouse having this issue?

 I had no issues with the setup (left-handed mouse worked fine) until I reinstalled it yesterday. Riot can't help me, can you?

replies.body:
Hey Aremca,

Can you try the solution in this thread:
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=325147&page=2

I've tried that. Now that everything is kept server side, nothing I do with my pc will change it back to how it was. I think Riot needs to do it but support people are jerks and threw a few old forum posts at me and sent me on my way
